data.title: AssetsManagerEx有严重问题，3.10的代码如果下载到一半关了APP，在打开会判断下载完成了
data.body: 现在下载了一个version就放在那里了，关掉后又起来version之前的verison已经下载好了，然后判断一下version相同就跳过下载了，其实上次下载还没有完

data.title: Add language localization support for Button, Text, TextField and TextBMFont.
Windows 10 http request not working
Why is there a DEBUG_MODE option wrapping around CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE?
data.body:
See here: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/CMakeLists.txt#L98

This is a bit problematic for systems that expect a standard way to configure a CMake project. I.e., `-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug` or `-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release`. Is setting `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE` directly insufficient for this project?

data.title: Fix compiler warning: "/* within block comment"
data.body:
This fixes the following warning when compiling with gcc (Linux) and clang (Xcode):

```
cocos/network/WebSocket.cpp:590:77: '/*' within block comment
```

data.title: 3.9 and 3.10 do not work on iOS Safari
data.body:
3.9 and 3.10 do not work in iOS Safari.

You can see this bug in action by downloading the html5 version ( lite or full ) and viewing the HelloWorld.html page in Safari.

The issue is that Safari won't append styles to the body. This causes a crash and the app stops running.

line 878 of the uncompressed, full version of cocos2d-js-v3.10.js

878 document.body.appendChild(fontStyle);

Change to

878 document.head.appendChild(fontStyle);

data.title: cpp-tests crash at Scene 8 - 11 in Node:SpritePolygon
[ci skip]add a function to get object name
data.body:
@pandamicro 
Please take a look. It only has effect in VSCode debugger.

data.title: Fix compile error on case-sensitive filesystems
data.body:
Hello, I got the following error when trying to compile the latest v3 branch on Mac.

```
cocos/ui/UIEditBox/Mac/CCUIEditBoxMac.h:28:10: '../UIEditboxImpl-mac.h' file not found
```

The problem only happened on case-sensitive filesystems, and this pull request fixes it.
Thanks.
